collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.li_1: Edit your documents in real-time with coworkers as if they were sitting across the desk. No matter that they’re bringing fresh ideas from across the world. Enable or disable the collaboration as needed and protect sensitive information with optional password. Works with both internal and external users.

interface.title: Interface
interface.li_1: More spacious horizontal bar including quick actions menu now facilitates more straightforward access to the most frequently used features.
interface.li_2: Clearly laid out folder tree helps to better navigate in public, private and shared resources.
interface.li_3: Know immediately if you can accept a proposed conference.\nInteractive invite dialog now shows an overview of your schedule around the indicated time.

search.title: Search
search.li_1:
Remember exactly the words mentioned but can’t recall the subject?
Or do you need to find everything a colleague sent you last week?
Full-text search across emails and documents won’t miss a thing.
And it’s prominently featured at the top of the screen.
